mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_board (email, title, content, review_bno, business_no, star_rate) VALUES (#{email}, #{title}, #{content}, seq_review_board.nextval, #{businessNo},#{starRate})
mapper.select: SELECT review_bno, email, title, content, last_updated, star_rate, like_cnt FROM review_board WHERE private = 'F' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review_like WHERE review_bno=#{reviewBno} AND email=#{email}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like WHERE email=#{email} AND review_bno=#{reviewBno}
